subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade scored 26 of his 34 points in the first half, James finished with 24 points and 8 assists and the Miami Heat beat the visiting Cavaliers, 117-90.
snippet: Dwyane Wade scored 26 of his 34 points in the first half, James finished with 24 points and 8 assists and the Miami Heat beat the visiting Cavaliers, 117-90.
